featured.text: It was printed in Flanders in 1474 by an Englishman, William Caxton.
The use of movable type was first introduced by (A) William Caxton.

definition.zh_def: 凱克斯頓，英國印刷商，於15世紀末至16世紀初推廣印刷技術。
definition.en_def: Caxton, an English printer who introduced the printing press to England in the late 15th century.
definition.example: William Caxton was the first to print books in the English language.
